name: Counter Animal Hunting
description:
Counter Animal Hunting Game is an amazing game for shooting game lovers here you can enjoy the sniper shooting and get real experience of gun shooting game. You are a best sniper shooter and apportioned on this duty to save the jungle animal from the bloody hunters. The deadly hunter is coming from random directions and attack on the wild animals so shoot down the bloody hunter with your sniper shooting gun prove yourself that you are the champion of such types of sniper missions. You are a best sniper shooter with good skills so show your shooting abilities against the animal hunter and become the real hero of this shooting game.
 Enjoy Counter Animal Hunting Game in the most adventurous and thrilling environment.Use your special sniper gun and kill the animal hunter. Shooting down the sharp hunter is not an easy task so be cool and wise while hitting the enemy, keep one eye on the target and one eye on the controls and shoot down the animal hunter. Take this most exciting and thrilling hunting mission very carefully and test your sniper shooting skills and become the hero of animal hunter shooting mission.

In this counter animal hunting game you are equipped with modern assault rifles and advance sniper guns, so take a best rifle of your choice and start shooting the animal hunters. Counter Animal Hunting game is best gun shooting game for sniper game lovers with stunning environment and amazing 3D graphics. In this adventurous mission you have to be very careful about your every move and shoot down the deadly animal hunter to win this amazing game.

Features:
• Addictive Game play.
• Smooth Controls.
• Adventurous and Challenging Missions.
• Stunning Environment.
• Realistic 3D Graphics.
• Modern Hunting simulator.
• Amazing sound effects
